issue.title: [CF 1389] Add the option to anchor to player resource bar
issue.body:
If you anchor the UI to the player resource bar (the one that hovers at your legs and has dynamic position+scale), it makes your UI always stay at your feet and scale according to the bar scale. It works great, but unfortunately the frame name is dynamic (at least from what I could tell from MoveAnything) so I can't just set it and forget it.

 

Not sure how/if this can be achieved but it has a very cool behavior to it.


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg | Imported from CurseForge issue #1389 | Raw

comments.body:
It should always be NamePlate1, but if it isn't, then I'm not sure what else do to.

 

You can try using Kui Nameplates (what I use for my nameplates), which will give it a more permanent name of KuiNameplatesPlayerAnchor.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
